Abundances matrix function

abs_mat.Rd

This function colors nodes by abundance at a taxonomic level.

Usage

abs_mat (abs.list, g.list, n)

Arguments

abs.list

Abundance list, the same lists you used to generate the network.

g.list

List of igraph objects (multilayer network).

n

Vertex number. Notice that if n>20 the nodes won't show too big.

Value

Returns a matrix, each column is a layer, and the values of the rows corresponds to the size of each node.

Examples


library(seqtime)
data ("mlnet_dstoolAB")

# Create abundance list
lst <- list(david_stoolA_otus, david_stoolB_otus)

abs_mat (abs.list = lst, g.list = mlnet_dstoolAB, n=10)
